headline: Is Equity Residential (EQR) Pricing Reflect Recent REIT Sentiment Shift?
summary: If you are wondering whether Equity Residential is attractively priced right now, this article will walk through what the current market value really implies for the business. The stock recently closed at US$63.86, with returns of around 3.0% year to date, 2.9% over the last 30 days, and a 6.5% decline over the past year. This recent performance raises questions about how the market is reassessing risk and reward. Recent coverage of Equity Residential has focused on how investors are...
